item.title: Recebtky repaired road has sunk, 29th July
item.description:
On the Gloucester bound side of the A38 immediately after the Hatherly rd the carriageway has sunk where it has recently been repaired
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A38, Twigworth, Tewkesbury

item.title: Right of way blocked by rubble at back of Shurdington Recycling Centre, 29th July
item.description:
Grid Ref: SO 91310 17979 The bridge across the fence line is thoroughly overgrown. There is more fencing than OS shows so no way to go round the recycling rubble pile. Rubble pile is industrial in scale - absolutely no way round it. Attempted a walk yesterday, 28/07/2025

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Badgeworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A40 / Christ Church Road traffic lights, 29th July
item.description:
Green phase for traffic exiting Christ Church Road onto A40 westbound is only around 8 seconds - lets half a dozen vehicles out at a time. As a result of current closure of Gloucester Road (B4633) westbound by the railway station, all traffic is being diverted along Queens Road, into Christ Church Road to access A40 outbound (West). Very short green phase from Christ Church Road onto A40 resulting in congestion at Queens Road / Christ Church Road traffic lights, and queues all along Queens Road and back into Gloucester Road. This short green phase has been reported numerous times before, but apparently ignored. Needs dealing with (green phase extending - at least doubling) to deal with additional traffic through this junction due to Gloucester Road closure.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Talbot Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Green or amber traffic light is not working

item.title: Valiant Way New Roundabout Roadworks still in place, 29th July
item.description:
The new roundabout roadworks along Valiant Way are still in place as of 29 July 2025, despite the one.network reporting them as finishing on 25 July. Have the crew not come to clear the works? There has been no one working on the site since the weekend.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Valiant Way, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sign/waymarker is damaged problem, 29th July
item.description:
Hi, Please see attached photo and sketch of a foot track in Fly up A417 Bike Park. The highlighted track in the attached sketch is currently used by the public, and Fly Up Bike has signposted it as a recognised PROW, as shown in the attached photo. However, it does not appear as a PROW on the GCC PROW map. Could you please confirm whether this highlighted track is officially recognised as a PROW or public footpath to be maintained. Kind Regards
Report on FixMyStreet
